title: Captain Adrian, are you ok?
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

+++ This is my **VERY** last minute artwork for Remixcon 2023 depicting Captain Adrian, aka SCP-6159-2, before their death in SCP-7616, with the SCP-1903 infection.  This is for [[*user fantem]] and [[*user opossumistic]]. The Pitch Haven series is what got me into the wiki and I'm enjoying Whore of Blood so far. So here's my gift to the both of them.

[[image https://i.imgur.com/zV4N4NS.png]]
author: spotkitty
